title: Entering Mosque Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Entering Mosque Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Entering Mosque Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 20
items.arabic: (يَبْدَأُ بِرِجْلِهِ الْيُمْنَى) ، وَيَقُولُ: ((أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ العَظِيمِ، وَبِوَجْهِهِ الْكَرِيمِ، وَسُلْطَانِهِ الْقَدِيمِ، مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ))  [بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، وَالصَّلَاةُ] [وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ]  ((اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ)).
items.transliteration: aAAoothu billahil-AAatheem wabiwajhihil-kareem wasultanihil-qadeem minash-shaytanir-rajeem, [bismil-lah, wassalatu] [wassalamu AAala rasoolil-lah], allahumma iftah lee abwaba rahmatik.
items.translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah.  O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء دخول المسجد
